Item.NAME: MAINE COON
Item.HEADLINE: HEALTHY HEART
Item.COPY: An exclusive nutrient complex, including taurine, EPA and DHA, may contribute to cardiac health in this larger breed.

Item.NAME: MAINE COON
Item.HEADLINE: JOINT STRENGTH
Item.COPY: The Maine Coon is the tallest and heaviest of pedigreed cats and their large size can place more stress on their joints. Enriched with Omega 3 fatty acids, the MAINE COON exclusive formula helps maintain the healthy bones and joints of this large breed cat.

Item.NAME: MAINE COON
Item.HEADLINE: RADIANT SKIN & COAT
Item.COPY: The Maine Coon’s dense coat benefits from a combination of amino acids, vitamins, and Omega 6 and Omega 3 fatty acids that help maintain skin & coat health.

Item.NAME: MAINE COON
Item.HEADLINE: TAILOR-MADE KIBBLE
Item.COPY: Specially designed king-sized kibble for the Maine Coon’s “square shaped” jaw encourages chewing.

Item.NAME: PERSIAN
Item.HEADLINE: TAILOR-MADE KIBBLE
Item.COPY: Specially designed kibble helps short-muzzled Persians naturally grasp food using the bottom of their tongue.

Item.NAME: PERSIAN
Item.HEADLINE: RADIANT SKIN & COAT
Item.COPY: With over 230 miles of hair, an optimal blend of amino acids, vitamins, Omega 6 and Omega 3 fatty acids help a Persian’s long hair look its best.

Item.NAME: PERSIAN
Item.HEADLINE: HAIRBALL CONTROL
Item.COPY: Prone to hairballs, special soluble and insoluble fibers help stimulate intestinal transit and naturally limit hairball formation.

Item.NAME: PERSIAN
Item.HEADLINE: DIGESTIVE HEALTH
Item.COPY: To aid the Persian’s digestive sensitivity, highly digestible proteins, prebiotics and fibers help support intestinal flora balance.

Item.NAME: PERSIAN
Item.HEADLINE: KITTEN
Item.COPY: Also available in PERSIAN KITTEN formula.

Item.NAME: RAGDOLL
Item.HEADLINE: HEALTHY HEART
Item.COPY: Nutrients like EPA and DHA, which may contribute to cardiac health, are included for this large breed.

Item.NAME: RAGDOLL
Item.HEADLINE: JOINT SUPPORT
Item.COPY: Large breeds put more stress on their joints. Enriched with Omega 3 fatty acids, the RAGDOLL specific formula helps maintain the healthy bones and joints of this large breed cat.

Item.NAME: RAGDOLL
Item.HEADLINE: RADIANT SKIN & COAT
Item.COPY: The Ragdoll’s silky, semi-longhaired coat benefits from antioxidants, vitamins, and Omega 6 and Omega 3 fatty acids, which help maintain skin & coat health.

Item.NAME: RAGDOLL
Item.HEADLINE: TAILOR-MADE KIBBLE
Item.COPY: Kibble is specially designed for the Ragdoll’s broad jaw to make it easier to grasp and encourage them to chew.

Item.NAME: SIAMESE
Item.HEADLINE: IDEAL BODY SHAPE
Item.COPY: Increased proteins (+11% compared to ADULT FIT formula) and a moderate fat level help maintain the Siamese’s slender and muscular figure.

Item.NAME: SIAMESE
Item.HEADLINE: DIGESTIVE HEALTH
Item.COPY: Highly digestible proteins, prebiotics help support intestinal flora balance to maintain digestive health.

Item.NAME: SIAMESE
Item.HEADLINE: HEALTHY SKIN & COAT
Item.COPY: Amino acids, vitamins, Omega 6 and Omega 3 fatty acids help the Siamese maintain a healthy skin and sleek, short coat.

Item.NAME: SIAMESE
Item.HEADLINE: TAILOR-MADE KIBBLE
Item.COPY: Specially designed tube-shaped kibble is easier for Siamese cats to grasp and encourages chewing, helping reduce the rate of food intake.

Item.NAME: KITTEN
Item.HEADLINE: EASY WEANING
Item.COPY: MOTHER & BABYCAT kibble is very small, with an ideal texture for the young kitten’s jaw & milk teeth. It can be rehydrated to ease the transition from milk to solid food.

Item.NAME: KITTEN
Item.HEADLINE: NATURAL DEFENSES
Item.COPY: Growth formulas contain prebiotics and an antioxidant complex with vitamin E, vitamin C, taurine and lutein to help support the growing kitten’s natural defenses.

Item.NAME: KITTEN
Item.HEADLINE: HEALTHY GROWTH
Item.COPY: During this intense growth period, highly digestible proteins, vitamins, and minerals help support good bone and muscular development.

Item.NAME: KITTEN
Item.HEADLINE: EASY-TO-DIGEST
Item.COPY: Highly digestible proteins, adapted fiber content including psyllium and prebiotics help support good digestion and stool quality.

Item.NAME: KITTEN
Item.HEADLINE: TAILOR-MADE KIBBLE
Item.COPY: Kibble in our KITTEN formulas are adapted in size and texture to be easier for young cats to eat during this time of growth and development.

Item.NAME: INDOOR
Item.HEADLINE: DENTAL HEALTH
Item.COPY: The kibble’s unique shape and texture creates a brushing effect during chewing to help fight plaque and tartar.

Item.NAME: INDOOR
Item.HEADLINE: HAIRBALL CONTROL
Item.COPY: INDOOR formulas contain special soluble and insoluble fibers to help stimulate intestinal transit and naturally limit hairball formation.

Item.NAME: INDOOR
Item.HEADLINE: SUPPORTS LEAN MUSCLES
Item.COPY: Optimal protein and fat levels support the sedentary nature of indoor cats. INDOOR LIGHT has high protein, reduced calories and L-Carnitine to help maintain body weight.

Item.NAME: INDOOR
Item.HEADLINE: REDUCES ODOR
Item.COPY: Improved digestibility of INDOOR formulas may contribute to smaller, less foul-smelling feces.

Item.NAME: INDOOR
Item.HEADLINE: SPECIAL COAT CARE
Item.COPY: INDOOR formulas nourish a cat’s fur, with INDOOR Beauty providing micro-nutrients, including essential vitamins and minerals, to renew the hair shaft after shedding.

Item.NAME: SPAYED/NEUTERED
Item.HEADLINE: HEALTHY WEIGHT
Item.COPY: After spaying or neutering, cats may have lower energy requirements. The moderate fat content in SPAYED/NEUTERED formulas help limit excess weight gain in these less active cats.

Item.NAME: SPAYED/NEUTERED
Item.HEADLINE: APPETITE CONTROL
Item.COPY: A unique blend of fibers found in SPAYED/NEUTERED Appetite Control helps satisfy the increased appetite of spayed and neutered cats to discourage overeating.

Item.NAME: SPAYED/NEUTERED
Item.HEADLINE: BALANCED NUTRITION
Item.COPY: SPAYED/NEUTERED products are formulated with all the necessary nutrients, at the right levels, to help keep cats healthy.

Item.NAME: SPAYED/NEUTERED
Item.HEADLINE: VITALITY & AGING CARE
Item.COPY: SPAYED/NEUTERED formulas for cats 7+ and 12+ include an exclusive antioxidant complex to help face the challenges of aging.

Item.NAME: SPAYED/NEUTERED
Item.HEADLINE: KITTEN
Item.COPY: Also available in SPAYED/NEUTERED KITTEN formula.

Item.NAME: SPAYED/NEUTERED
Item.HEADLINE: TAILOR-MADE KIBBLE
Item.COPY: The special design of the kibble in SPAYED/NEUTERED Appetite Control helps spayed and neutered cats feel fuller longer.

Item.NAME: SPECIAL NEEDS
Item.HEADLINE: DIGESTIVE HEALTH
Item.COPY: Poor digestion can impact your cat’s health. SPECIAL33 includes highly digestible proteins and specific fermentable fibers to ease digestion.

Item.NAME: SPECIAL NEEDS
Item.HEADLINE: TAILORED TEXTURES
Item.COPY: SELECTIVE34/29 Savor sensation has two kibbles with differing shapes and textures for cats sensitive to how food feels in their mouth.

Item.NAME: SPECIAL NEEDS
Item.HEADLINE: ENHANCED AROMAS
Item.COPY: For cats sensitive to food aromas, SELECTIVE31 Aromatic attraction features a specialized aromatic profile formulated to appeal to finicky felines.

Item.NAME: SPECIAL NEEDS
Item.HEADLINE: IDEAL POST INGESTION
Item.COPY: SELECTIVE Protein preference appeals to cats with post-ingestion sensitivities through optimal ratios of protein, fat and carbohydrates.

Item.NAME: SPECIAL NEEDS
Item.HEADLINE: SKIN & COAT CARE
Item.COPY: HAIR & SKIN 33 includes nutrients like amino acids, vitamins and specific minerals to help nourish and strengthen a cat’s skin and fur.

Item.NAME: SPECIAL NEEDS
Item.HEADLINE: ORAL SENSITIVITIES
Item.COPY: For cats with dental sensitivities, ORAL SENSITIVE 30 has a kibble with a unique shape and texture to promote a brushing effect that helps reduce plaque formation.

Item.NAME: WET
Item.HEADLINE: OPTIMAL MACRO NUTRIENTS
Item.COPY: Age and condition influence a cat’s nutritional needs. Each FELINE WET formula adapts to a cat’s needs with an instinctively preferred Macro Nutrient Profile of proteins, fats and carbohydrates.

Item.NAME: WET
Item.HEADLINE: KITTEN
Item.COPY: Also available in KITTEN formulas.

Item.NAME: WET
Item.HEADLINE: SPAYED/NEUTERED SUPPORT
Item.COPY: Moderate energy levels and balanced vitamins and minerals in SPAYED/NEUTERED formulas help adult cats maintain a healthy weight.

Item.NAME: WET
Item.HEADLINE: HEALTHY WEIGHT
Item.COPY: The reduced-calorie ULTRA LIGHT formula with added protein is designed to support a healthy weight while maintaining muscle mass.

Item.NAME: WET
Item.HEADLINE: FOCUSED BEAUTY
Item.COPY: INTENSE BEAUTY contains optimal balance of nutrients to nourish the coat, and help cats maintain an ideal weight.

Item.NAME: WET
Item.HEADLINE: SATISFYING TEXTURE AND TASTE
Item.COPY: Most wet formulas are available in two textures, thin slices in gravy and loaf in sauce.
